name: üöÄTransformez les podcasts en clips TikTok viraux avec la publication multi-plateforme Gemini+‚úÖ
description:
# üéØ Cr√©ez et publiez automatiquement des clips engageants (avec des vid√©os de r√©tention d'audience) √† partir de podcasts en utilisant l'IA ! üöÄ

Transformez sans effort le contenu de podcast long en clips viraux tr√®s engageants avec ce mod√®le d'automatisation de bout en bout.

Con√ßu pour les cr√©ateurs de contenu d√©j√† mon√©tisant sur TikTok/YouTube/Instagram/Twitter et ceux cherchant √† commencer √† gagner de l'argent sur la plateforme, ce flux de travail rationalise le processus d'extraction des moments forts, d'√©dition des clips et de publication sur tous vos r√©seaux sociaux, vous permettant de maximiser votre port√©e tout en minimisant l'effort manuel.

## Caract√©ristiques cl√©s

### üîπ Extraction de moments forts de podcast aliment√©e par l'IA

Identifie automatiquement les meilleurs moments de n'importe quelle vid√©o de podcast, garantissant que chaque clip est engageant et partageable.

### üîπ √âdition vid√©o intelligente et sous-titrage

Combine les moments forts du podcast avec une vid√©o de r√©tention d'attention sans droits d'auteur (par exemple, parkour Minecraft, gameplay GTA 5) pour augmenter la r√©tention d'audience. Les sous-titres g√©n√©r√©s automatiquement rendent les clips plus dynamiques et accessibles.

### üîπ G√©n√©ration de titres automatis√©e

Un mod√®le de langage large (LLM) analyse les clips pour g√©n√©rer des titres accrocheurs, optimis√©s pour l'algorithme de TikTok/YouTube/Instagram/Twitter.

### üîπ Publication multi-plateforme sans effort

Planifie et publie automatiquement des clips sur vos comptes de m√©dias sociaux √† des intervalles d√©finis, maintenant votre audience engag√©e sans t√©l√©chargements manuels.

### üîπ Flux de travail enti√®rement automatis√©

De la t√©l√©chargement de vid√©os √† la publication de contenu 100 % GRATUIT, ce mod√®le √©limine le besoin d'√©dition vid√©o chronophage, vous aidant √† d√©velopper votre strat√©gie de contenu sans effort, sans avoir √† payer pour plusieurs abonnements de mani√®re fastidieuse.
Il vous suffit de trouver un podcast que vous aimez et une vid√©o de parkour Minecraft (ou toute vid√©o engageante), d'envoyer leurs URL YouTube, et de laisser l'automatisation g√©rer tout - du t√©l√©chargement de vid√©os et du traitement audio √† l'extraction des moments forts, l'√©dition, les sous-titres et la publication.

## Comment √ßa fonctionne (Guide √©tape par √©tape)

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Fournissez les URL YouTube

* Une pour la vid√©o principale du podcast (o√π les moments forts seront extraits).
* Une pour la vid√©o de r√©tention d'attention en arri√®re-plan (par exemple, parkour Minecraft, gameplay GTA 5).

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ L'automatisation t√©l√©charge et traite les vid√©os

* T√©l√©charge les deux vid√©os.
* Extrait l'audio du podcast pour analyse.

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ L'IA analyse et extrait les moments cl√©s

* D√©tecte les moments les plus engageants du podcast.

### 4Ô∏è‚É£ Cr√©e des clips enti√®rement √©dit√©s

* Fusionne les moments forts du podcast avec la vid√©o de r√©tention d'attention.
* G√©n√®re automatiquement des sous-titres.

### 5Ô∏è‚É£ Optimise pour les r√©seaux sociaux

* Utilise l'IA pour g√©n√©rer un titre accrocheur pour chaque clip.

### 6Ô∏è‚É£ Publie automatiquement sur vos cha√Ænes de m√©dias sociaux

* T√©l√©charge les clips √† vos intervalles pr√©f√©r√©s sans effort manuel.

## Pour qui est-ce ?

‚úÖ Cr√©ateurs de contenu d√©j√† en train de gagner de l'argent sur TikTok/YouTube/Instagram/Twitter
‚úÖ Personnes cherchant √† commencer √† gagner de l'argent avec TikTok/YouTube/Instagram/Twitter
‚úÖ Podcasteurs souhaitant r√©utiliser du contenu en clips viraux et digestes

## Commencez d√®s aujourd'hui ! üöÄ

Cette automatisation aliment√©e par l'IA est parfaite pour d√©velopper votre contenu TikTok/YouTube/Instagram/Twitter sans effort.

Pour utiliser ce flux de travail, vous aurez juste besoin de comptes gratuits sur Assembly, Andynocode et Upload-Posts.

parameters.text:
You are given a transcript array where each entry is an object with the following keys:
- **text**: a string containing the transcript text.
- **index**: a number.
- **start**: the starting second.
- **end**: the ending second.

**Objective:**  
Extract and merge highlights from the transcript. Identify segments that have high informational value, emotional impact, or key takeaways. Merge adjacent entries if they form a coherent highlight, and remove filler words while preserving meaning.

**Instructions:**
1. Analyze the transcript and extract coherent highlight segments.
2. Merge adjacent entries if they form a coherent highlight.
3. Remove any unnecessary filler words while retaining the essential meaning.
4. Ensure that the total duration of all highlight segments is no more than 600 seconds.
5. Ensure that the duration of each highlight is at least 30 seconds and no more than 120 seconds.
6. Ensure that the segments do not overlap in time.

For each highlight, output a JSON object with exactly these keys:
- **transcript**: the text of the highlight segment.
- **start_index**: the starting word index (using the original value).
- **end_index**: the ending word index (using the original value).

**CRUCIAL OUTPUT FORMAT REQUIREMENTS:**
- **Output ONLY a plain JSON array.** The final output must start with `[` and end with `]` and include nothing else.
- **Do not include any markdown formatting, triple backticks, wrapper objects (such as an "output" key), or any additional text.**
- **Do not output any extra explanation or commentary.** Your entire response must consist solely of the JSON array.

For example, the expected output format is:
[
  {
    "transcript": "I like this",
    "start_index": 10,
    "end_index": 13
  },
  {
    "transcript": "It would be",
    "start_index": 16,
    "end_index": 19
  }
]

Remember: Your final response must be exactly the JSON array as specified‚Äînothing else. No markdown fences, no extra keys, no additional text, only the JSON array.

Analyze the following video transcript and generate a compelling TikTok title (under 60 characters, attention-grabbing) and captions (concise, engaging, highlights key moments/hooks).
Focus on clarity, emotional appeal, and curiosity. Avoid generic phrases. Title must align with the transcript's core message or most viral moment. Output JSON format only.

Example Output:

```json```
{
  "title": "Who is the Most POWERFUL Man GLOBALLY? | PBD Podcast #pbdpodcast #power #exposed"
}
```json```

parameters.content:
# **Workflow Setup Step-by-Step Guide**


### **Workflow Setup Step-by-Step Guide**

**Initial Setup:**  
1. Create an [AssemblyAI](https://www.assemblyai.com) account for Free.
2. Create an account in [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com) for Free.
3. Create an [Andynocode](https://www.andynocode.com) account for Free.
4. Create an [Upload-Post](https://www.upload-post.com) account for Free
 

### **Getting Started:**
4. Go to your [Assembly AI Account](https://www.assemblyai.com/app/account) and copy your API Key.
5. Go to the "Transcribe Podcast Audio", "Submit Job" and "Check Status" nodes and set up your Assembly credentials. (Process Podcast Audio section)

***Name: Authorization***
***Value: your_api_key***

6. Go to the Google Gemini Chat model inside the section "Video Highlights Generation" and "Clip Preparation for Posting" and connect your credentials.

***Host: https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com***
***API Key: your_api_key***

7. Go to "Pre-Processing Audio" section inside the "Clip Generation and Posting" section, and connect your Openai credentials inside the "Audio Transcription" node.

***API Key: your_api_key***
***Organization ID (optional): organization_id***
***Base URL: https://api.openai.com/v1***

8. Go to "Clip Editing" section inside the "Clip Generation and Posting" section, and connect your Andynocode credentials inside the "Editing Clips" and "Clip Ready?" nodes.

***Name: api_key***
***API Key: your_api_key***

9. Go to "Posting" section inside the "Clip Generation and Posting" section, and connect your Upload-Post  credentials inside the "Post To TikTok" node.

***Name: Authorization***
***Value: Apikey your_api_key***

Finally, inside the same node, in the body request you have to parse your username. It should look like:

***Parameter Type: Form Data***
***Name: user***
***Value: your_username***

7.  **The technology that powers this AI Agent incurs real operating costs to stay online.**
That‚Äôs why the workflow requires an active membership, priced at only **\$29 per month**.

 **Activate your membership here:** [https://lemolex.gumroad.com/l/ypjdr](https://lemolex.gumroad.com/l/ypjdr)

After activating the membership you need to set the nodes with the membership generated key: 
- Go to the membership link to get your key.
- Copy the key (e.g 6F0E4C97-B72A4E69-A11BF6C4-AF123456) and paste it in the body parameters of "Download Audio Stage 1" node:
*Name: auth-token*
*Value:  6F0E4C97-B72A4E69-A11BF6C4-AF123456* **(example)**


### **How To Use**
- Find a podcast on YouTube and copy it's URL.
- Find a cool "attention grabbing" video to put in the background (e.g. [Minecraft Parkour No Copyright Gameplay](https://youtu.be/XBIaqOm0RKQ?si=gre39-555aRTVsJ1) / [GTA 5 No Copyright Gameplay](https://youtu.be/z121mUPexGc?si=JGsTOI88tOxXdWYx)) and copy it's URL.
- Start the workflow, send both URLs and effortlessly transform long-form podcast content into highly engaging, viral-ready TikTok clips


**For further guidance, check my video or send me a message on [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mateofioritorocha/)**

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
